Smart coffee maker: A coffee maker that can learn your coffee preferences and make personalized coffee blends for you based on your taste.
Coffee maker with built-in Wi-Fi: A coffee maker that can be controlled remotely through a smartphone app or voice assistant.
Coffee maker with a built-in grinder: A coffee maker that can grind your coffee beans right before brewing, ensuring the perfect grind size for your preferred taste.
Coffee maker with a built-in milk frother: A coffee maker that can froth milk and add it to your coffee, creating a perfect latte or cappuccino.
Coffee maker with a built-in espresso machine: A coffee maker that can brew a strong, concentrated shot of espresso, perfect for adding to lattes or cappuccinos.
